title: Bathroom Cleaning & Maintenance
description: A clean and hygienic bathroom is crucial for a healthy home. Regular cleaning and simple maintenance can prevent grime buildup, mold, and plumbing issues.
sentences: Regularly clean the toilet, sink, and shower/tub to prevent germ buildup.
Ensure good ventilation by using an exhaust fan or opening a window to prevent mold and mildew.
Organize toiletries and medicines, discarding any that are expired.
Squeegee shower walls after use to prevent soap scum and water spots.
Tackle hard water stains with appropriate cleaners like vinegar.
dos: Do a quick wipe-down of surfaces daily.
Conduct a thorough deep clean once a week.
Wash bath mats and shower curtains regularly.
Check for and fix any minor leaks promptly to prevent water damage.
donts: Don't use abrasive cleaners on delicate surfaces.
Don't mix different cleaning chemicals, especially bleach and ammonia.
Don't ignore slow drains; they can lead to bigger clogs.
Don't let moisture sit on floors or surfaces for long periods.
